Draghi: An account should preserve independence of the GovC and collegiality of its discussions. This precludes attribution to individuals.
Draghi: Publication of an account of Governing Council discussions  enhances transparency in a more complex and heterogeneous environment
Draghi: A worsening of the medium-term outlook for inflation would warrant a more broad-based asset purchase programme
Draghi: The exchange rate is not a policy target, but a rise in the exchange rate, all else being equal, implies a monetary tightening
Draghi: We’ll respond with specific measures to unwarranted tightening of our mon. policy stance or further impairment in its transmission
Draghi: Forward guidance has given guidance on exp. level of future interest rates, while successfully reducing uncertainty about that level
Draghi: Crisis made us reaffirm our mandate and explain its symmetry, its medium-term orientation and its euro area perspective
Draghi: In crisis conditions understanding ECB’s reaction function became more complex. So we had to be more explicit in our communication
Draghi: Transparency of a central bank not only serves the general public, it also contributes to its own mission, by steering expectations
